game.name: The Way of the Ace
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Compete for dominance of the court and experience the thrill of volleyball! Serve, receive, set, spike, and block your way to victory! Do you have what it takes to be the ace?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Compete for dominance of the court and experience the thrill of volleyball! Serve, receive, set, spike, and block your way to victory! Do you have what it takes to be the ace?
